template<class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
enum iqt2d::TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp::CellIndex

Cell index.

Enumerator:
CI_X 

Index of the table cell for the X coordinate of the polygon node.

CI_Y 

Index of the table cell for the X coordinate of the polygon node.

CI_LAST 

Last used cell index.
